original_text: And I made an ark of shittim wood, and hewed two tables of stone like unto the first, and went up into the mount, having the two tables in mine hand.
korean_text: 내가 조각목으로 궤를 만들고 처음 것과 같은 돌판 둘을 다듬어 손에 들고 산에 오르매

sentences.original_text: And I made an ark of shittim wood
and hewed two tables of stone like unto the first
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 것과 같이 두 돌판을 깎아 만들고

sentences.original_text: and went up into the mount
having the two tables in mine hand
sentences.korean_translation: 두 돌판을 내 손에 가지고 있었노라
